about_the_game:
An exciting collection of 20 original RPG tracks that will transport you back to the glorious sounds of the 90s!

These songs cover everything from epic boss battles to intense field exploration and heart-pounding event sequences. Get ready for a nostalgia-filled adventure!

【Contents】
01. Keep Running!
02. A Pleasant Journey
03. Sword of Darkness
04. Valley of the Wind
05. Waku Waku Hiking!
06. Cave Hideout
07. Fluttering Scarf
08. Good Luck, Robot!
09. Computer Room XYZ
10. Melted Watch
11. Strange Feeling
12. Feels Like a Bear's Nearby
13. Magic Spell
14. Go to Work! Go to Work!
15. Sleepy Princess
16. Toy King
17. On a Quiet Hill
18. Dawn Sunlight
19. Abracadabra of the Sorcerer
20. March of the Brave Dwarfs


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
